Perhaps so, and=C2=A0I would certainly like to=C2=A0believe that, but it ha=
sn't been my experience so far. That said, I've still got a long ways to go=
 and I respect that you've been at this for a lot longer than I have, Frank=
. 
=C2=A0
For me their timelines are usually a bit skeewompous, doesn't mea=
n that's the way it is for all of=C2=A0them necessarily. Like I said, I dun=
no, but I'm trying to find out.=C2=A0 ;)
=C2=A0
Best, 
J
=C2=A0

On Mon, Dec 20, 2010 at 5:01 PM, Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@...=
> wrote:


=C2=A0 








Just my two cents and input based=C2=A0on what I=
 get from my ancestral guides and guardians...
=C2=A0
The spiritual dimensi=
on and those who reside there=C2=A0do not=C2=A0perceive "time" as we do in=
=C2=A0the typical=C2=A0linear fashion. Remember the saying, "In the twinkli=
ng of an eye?"
=C2=A0
10,000 years here may only seem like a few precious m=
oments over=C2=A0there, and vice versa. 
=C2=A0
They also remind me of the =
quantum field, string theory, our=C2=A0holographic Universe (etc)=C2=A0and =
that ALL time is "ticking" (past, present=C2=A0& future) at the very same m=
oment. It's all happening=C2=A0RIGHT=C2=A0NOW in various levels, layers, al=
ternative realities and spiritual/energetic dimensions.
=C2=A0
The end of t=
he Earth has already happened (for them and us!) in many ways. Depending on=
 who you're speaking=C2=A0to, some even describe what it was like when=C2=
=A0the planet Earth was destroyed, speaking as though it has/had already oc=
cured.=C2=A0There would also be dimensions in which this event has already =
occured thousands of years ago, 5 minutes ago, 3 days from now and 10,000 y=
ears into the future and every other possible scenario. 
=C2=A0
So which on=
e is the RIGHT one then? 
=C2=A0
Well, I think they all are. 
=C2=A0
Becaus=
e "they" live in a world of "source energy", light, consciousness and perfe=
ct=C2=A0information fields...one that's=C2=A0so completely and totally diff=
erent to our own experience here/now=C2=A0and are=C2=A0not limited by linea=
r time and local/non-local space=C2=A0or relativity like we are, it's likel=
y very difficult for most of the beings we would speak to through the box t=
o give us specific information regarding such an event or the exact time (o=
r even "which Earth" they are referencing, dimensionally speaking!). 
=C2=
=A0
In other words, they don't experience any of this stuff (and especially=
=C2=A0"time") like we do. =C2=A0
=C2=A0
To end,=C2=A0for several years=C2=
=A0now I've been=C2=A0a devoted care-giver to the ancient quartz=C2=A0cryst=
al skulls=C2=A0of Mayan legend=C2=A0and much of the mythologies and folklor=
e surrounding these objects is focused around 2012 and the impending=C2=A0G=
reat Shift. I've also=C2=A0studied South American culture (past and present=
), anthropology,=C2=A0folklore=C2=A0and tribal customs along with=C2=A0thei=
r indigenous wisdom systems in=C2=A0varying=C2=A0depth with the Kogi Indian=
s, Quechua Curanderos and residents of the Amazon. 
=C2=A0
For many years I=
 followed the work of Terence McKenna=C2=A0rather closely and Terence is so=
meone I consider a man-genius far ahead of his time (may he rest in peace).=
 He developed a time-mapping system based on the I-Ching, the Mayan Calenda=
r, Great Pyramids, DMT-beings, fractals, plant consciousness=C2=A0and other=
 mathematic systems=C2=A0that showed a sharp spike followed by a near-perfe=
ct "dip" before it went off the charts and moved into "nothingness" complet=
ely around December 21st, 2012...and even Terence didn't think this is when=
 the world would end, necessarily. 
=C2=A0
(His "official" position is that=
 he simply didn't know what to make of it or expect. One theory is that his=
 algorithms reflected such a change during a time=C2=A0that humanity may ha=
ve finally broken the time/space barrier and uncovered the keys to time tra=
vel and 4th dimensional plane-shifting, to name just one possible solution.=
). =C2=A0
=C2=A0
I've also been fortunate enough to live in Swaziland, Sout=
h Africa with the Swazi, Zulu, Xhosa=C2=A0and San Bushmen tribes who (like =
most other cultures throughout time and history)=C2=A0also have their own t=
eachings and mystery traditions surrounding
this and other events. 
=C2=A0
=
Given that the San are the most ancient tribal peoples and humanities oldes=
t ancestors still living in the world today and whose incredible healing kn=
owledge, spiritual wisdoms and mystical practices far exceed any I've ever =
heard of or personally witnessed anywhere else in the world and they don't =
seem to feel that life on this=C2=A0planet=C2=A0is going to end anytime soo=
n, so I'm not going to panic just yet. 
=C2=A0
These amazing people have th=
eir ears pressed up very closely to the heartbeat and rhythms of Mother Ear=
th and told me firsthand that before the end comes certain events will take=
 place on a scale the whole world will be instantly made aware of...events =
that could still take several hundred or even thousands of years to unfold.=

=C2=A0
All I know for my own self, personally, is that I have no clue what=
's going to happen...but it will be okay, no matter what takes place. There=
 are worst things than dying, believe me...and part of what makes our work =
with the Ghost Box and ITC in general so helpful and inspiring is that we c=
an find a level of peace and comfort through our sessions and recordings we=
 might actually need one day, whether soon or in some distant time - we're =
all going to end up there eventually, no doubt about it! 
=C2=A0
FINAL NOTE=
: I don't have all the answers...I don't even have all the questions, and I=
 know it. My guess is as good as any and I could be completely and totally =
WRONG about all of this (I'm open to that and=C2=A0I'm perfectly fine with =
it). Believe you me, if the world ends when a lot of=C2=A0folks think it mi=
ght I'll be just as surprised as anyone. Until then I'll keep doing what I =
do now; realizing that I don't know a damn thing, taking life as it comes t=
o me day by precious=C2=A0day, treating it with respect and honoring=C2=A0m=
y experience here=C2=A0as the gift it is, loving others, being good to the =
people around me=C2=A0and enjoying my family and time spent here while I ca=
n. 
=C2=A0
And I won't be afraid...not even for one second or when I'm look=
ing up and seeing that big f***ing rock heading right towards us, hahaha. F=
or all I know (or anyone here for that matter), I could be blindsided by a =
Mac truck later this evening! 
=C2=A0
Many of the people worried over 2012 =
won't even be here when 2012 arrives...now how's THAT for a mind-f**k!?!?
=
=C2=A0
;)
=C2=A0
-J
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

Frank,

Remember last year when =
we both got the August predictions? That didn't pan out, so i wouldn't take=
 what they say too seriously. They have never said anything that came true =
yet, i don't think they can.

I'm pretty sure that they can't tell the futu=
re, so when they say stuff i think they are just messing with us to see wha=
t we do with the information. They might even be laughing at us !

-Steve

=

for a lot longer than I have, Frank. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For me t=
heir timelines are usually a bit skeewompous, doesn't mean that's the way i=
t is for all of them necessarily. Like I said, I dunno, but I'm trying=
 to find out.  ;)</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Best, </DIV>
<DIV>J</DI=
V>
<DIV> </DIV>

I><purplealiengirl@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE st=
yle=3D"BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEF=

<DIV class=3Dyiv729929017gmail_=

nga4@...</A>></SPAN> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: =
#ccc 1px solid" class=3Dyiv729929017gmail_quote>
<DIV style=3D"BACKGROUND-C=
OLOR: #fff"><SPAN> </SPAN> 
<DIV>

<DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE border=3D0 =
cellSpacing=3D0 cellPadding=3D0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=3Dtop>
<DIV>Just m=
y two cents and input based on what I get from my ancestral guides and=
 guardians...</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The spiritual dimension and thos=
e who reside there do not perceive "time" as we do in the ty=
pical linear fashion. Remember the saying, <EM>"In the twinkling of an=
 eye?"</EM></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>10,000 years here may only seem li=
ke a few precious moments over there, and vice versa. </DIV>
<DIV>&nbs=
p;</DIV>
<DIV>They also remind me of the quantum field, string theory, our&=
nbsp;holographic Universe (etc) and that <EM><U>ALL time is "ticking"<=
/U></EM> (past, present & future) at the very same moment. It's al=
l happening RIGHT NOW in various levels, layers, alternative real=
ities and spiritual/energetic dimensions.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The =
end of the Earth has already happened (for them and us!) in many ways. Depe=
nding on who you're speaking to, some even describe <EM>what it was li=
ke</EM> when the planet Earth was destroyed, speaking as though it has=
/had already occured. There would also be dimensions in which this eve=
nt has already occured thousands of years ago, 5 minutes ago, 3 days from n=
ow and 10,000 years into the future and every other possible scenario. </DI=
V>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>So which one is the RIGHT one then? </DIV>
<DIV>&=
nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV>Well, I think they all are. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>=
Because "they" live in a world of "source energy", light, consciousness and=
 perfect information fields...one that's so completely and totall=
y different to our own experience here/now and are not limited by=
 linear time and local/non-local space or relativity like we are, it's=
 likely very difficult for most of the beings we would speak to through the=
 box to give us specific information regarding such an event or the exact t=
ime (or even "which Earth" they are referencing, dimensionally speaking!). =
</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>In other words, they don't experience any of =
this stuff (and especially "time") like we do.  </DIV>
<DIV>&nbsp=
;</DIV>
<DIV>To end, for several years now I've been a devot=
ed care-giver to the ancient quartz crystal skulls of Mayan legen=
d and much of the mythologies and folklore surrounding these objects i=
s focused around 2012 and the impending Great Shift. I've also st=
udied South American culture (past and present), anthropology, folklor=
e and tribal customs along with their indigenous wisdom systems i=
n varying depth with the Kogi Indians, Quechua Curanderos and res=
idents of the Amazon. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For many years I follow=
ed the work of Terence McKenna rather closely and Terence is someone I=
 consider a man-genius far ahead of his time (may he rest in peace). He dev=
eloped a time-mapping system based on the I-Ching, the Mayan Calendar, Grea=
t Pyramids, DMT-beings, fractals, plant consciousness and other mathem=
atic systems that showed a sharp spike followed by a near-perfect "dip=
" before it went off the charts and moved into "nothingness" completely aro=
und December 21st, 2012...and even Terence didn't think this is when the wo=
rld would end, necessarily. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>(His "official" p=
osition is that he simply didn't know what to make of it or expect. One the=
ory is that his algorithms reflected such a change during a time that =
humanity may have finally broken the time/space barrier and uncovered the k=
eys to time travel and 4th dimensional plane-shifting, to name just one pos=
sible solution.).  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I've also been fortun=
ate enough to live in Swaziland, South Africa with the Swazi, Zulu, Xhosa&n=
bsp;and San Bushmen tribes who (like most other cultures throughout time an=
d history) also have their own teachings and mystery traditions surrou=
nding<BR>this and other events. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Given that th=
e San are the most ancient tribal peoples and humanities oldest ancestors s=
till living in the world today and whose incredible healing knowledge, spir=
itual wisdoms and mystical practices far exceed any I've ever heard of or p=
ersonally witnessed anywhere else in the world and they don't seem to feel =
that life on this planet is going to end anytime soon, so I'm not=
 going to panic just yet. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>These amazing peopl=
e have their ears pressed up very closely to the heartbeat and rhythms of M=
other Earth and told me firsthand that before the end comes certain events =
will take place on a scale the whole world will be instantly made aware of.=
..events that could still take several hundred or even thousands of years t=
o unfold.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>All I know for my own self, personal=
ly, is that I have no clue what's going to happen...but it will be okay, no=
 matter what takes place. There are worst things than dying, believe me...a=
nd part of what makes our work with the Ghost Box and ITC in general so hel=
pful and inspiring is that we can find a level of peace and comfort through=
 our sessions and recordings we might actually need one day, whether soon o=
r in some distant time - we're all going to end up there eventually, no dou=
bt about it! </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV><STRONG>FINAL NOTE:</STRONG> I d=
on't have all the answers...I don't even have all the questions, and I know=
 it. My guess is as good as any and I could be completely and totally WRONG=
 about all of this (I'm open to that and I'm perfectly fine with it). =
Believe you me, if the world ends when a lot of folks think it might I=
'll be just as surprised as anyone. Until then I'll keep doing what I do no=
w; realizing that I don't know a damn thing, taking life as it comes to me =
day by precious day, treating it with respect and honoring my exp=
erience here as the gift it is, loving others, being good to the peopl=
e around me and enjoying my family and time spent here while I can. </=
DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>And I won't be afraid...not even for one second=
 or when I'm looking up and seeing that big f***ing rock heading right towa=
rds us, hahaha. For all I know (or anyone here for that matter), I could be=
 blindsided by a Mac truck later this evening! </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DI=
V>Many of the people worried over 2012 won't even be here when 2012 arrives=
...now how's THAT for a mind-f**k!?!?</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>;)</DIV>=

<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>-J</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
